summary: End of Session 02: Hadvar captured alive under Ralof custody; Aela encounter resolved via concession + Hunt-debt; civilians evacuated toward Temple of Kynareth; stair defenses collapsed; Khagar public werebear incident completes Thalmor Scent-Scry escalation; session ends at Dragonsreach approach.
canonical_decisions: Hadvar Taken Out alive; final call given to Ralof; Ralof chose custody over execution.
Aela conceded before being Taken Out; Aela's Hunting Bow recovered; Aela released under oath to withdraw to Jorrvaskr; Hunt-debt established.
Civilian evacuation corridor established toward Temple of Kynareth.
Khagar transformed publicly into werebear during Cloud District push (Thalmor diviners escalate).
